item.description: Fatal Traffic Collision; INC#1407; 05:04PM; 5828 N Kester Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Uyc3Ed; #VanNuys; PRELIM: Reported vehicle vs. motorcycle collision with one person (unknown age / gender / believed to be the motorcyclist), discovered deceased beneath the vehicle. No other injuries reported. No further details. Media Inquiries: LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #3162) and Coroner.; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; E102 E288 RA90 RA99 T88 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Rescue; INC#0852; 12:37PM; 18900 W Braemore Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3VezUtB; #PorterRanch; PRELIM: Adult female with an arm injury, sustained in a fall (unknown circumstances) approximately 10' down a steep hillside. First arriving LAFD ground crews will handle. They have rappelled to the patient, to secure her physically, stabilize her injuries, and anticipate using a rope rescue system to bring to her to safety. No further details.; FS 8; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC10 BC15 E275 E288 E289 E8 E88 E90 EM15 H1 H4 H6 HA1 HA4 HA6 HR3 RA18 RH114 T75 T88 T89 UR88 UR89; CH8; 13; Brian Humphrey

Fatality Traffic Collision; INC#1390; 07:19PM; 18060 W Rinaldi St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3XvjY7I; #GranadaHills; One patient only, deceased and remains at scene. No further details. Media Inquiries: LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #3106) ; FS 8; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; E8 RA828 RA87; CH8; Brian Humphrey

Brush Fire; INC#0833; 01:27PM; EB 118 Fwy east of Rocky Peak Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/36NVi10; #Chatsworth; LAFD ground units with Ventura County Fire Department resources at scene will handle one-quarter (0.25) acre of brush along the eastbound shoulder of the Ronald Reagan (SR118) Freeway. No structure threat. No injury.; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District outside city; AO1 BC12 BC15 BC17 CM40 CM42 E104 E105 E106 E28 E290 E296 E305 E70 E8 E87 E90 EM17 H2 H3 H4 HA2 HA3 HA4 RA106 T105 T90 T96 + VCFD; CH5; 17; Brian Humphrey

Fatality Traffic Collision; INC#0696; 11:47AM; 13820 W Foothill Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/32NAPem; #Sylmar; PRELIM: Two vehicle collision. Teenage male driver of sedan deceased and remains at scene after colliding with pickup truck and striking pole. 56 year-old male driver of pickup truck transported by LAFD Paramedics to an area hospital in fair condition with non-life threatening injuries. No further details. Media Inquiries: LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #1574); FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; E275 E91 EM15 RA81 RA891 RA898 RA91 T75; CH8; Brian Humphrey

Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#0384; 07:17AM; 11160 N San Fernando Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OEnCYW; #Pacoima; PRELIM: Two vehicle collision. Four patients total (1 critical, 1 serious, 2 minor injuries), one person is trapped. No further details. Media Inquiries: LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #909); FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E275 E298 E7 E91 EM15 HR3 RA75 RA91 T75 T98 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0294; 06:08AM; 2029 W Jefferson Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3u1Mz7h; Jefferson Park; KNOCKDOWN: 50 FF extinguished the fire in 39 minutes with no injuries reported. The original fire building is a total loss while firefighters stopped an attic fire burning in the exposed commercial building on the Delta (East) side. The exposed building is described as a one story commercial building with 3 occupancies (estimated). ; FS 34; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E15 E203 E205 E226 E229 E26 E27 E294 E68 E94 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA15 RA34 RA94 T26 T29 T3 T5 T94 UR3 UR88; CH9; 14 15; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0294; 05:43AM; 2029 W Jefferson Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3u1Mz7h; Jefferson Park; The one story commercial building is heavily involved in fire and two additional task forces are enroute. The building on the Delta (East) side of the building has possible extension into the attic (one story bungalow). Firefighters are using a wagon battery off an engine to knock back the fire while heavy streams and hand lines are being deployed. ; FS 34; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E15 E203 E205 E226 E229 E26 E27 E294 E68 E94 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA34 T26 T29 T3 T5 T94 UR3 UR88; CH9; 14 15; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0294; 05:29AM; 2029 W Jefferson Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3u1Mz7h; Jefferson Park; One story, commercial building with heavy fire showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. There is at least one additional building exposed.; FS 34; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC18 E15 E226 E94 RA34 T26; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Update FATALITY Structure Fire; INC#0242; 04:54AM; 1359 W 54th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/2OGRVDV; Vermont Square; After knockdown, firefighters were overhauling the fire and located a deceased person inside the vehicle (this was an auto fire which extended into the commercial building). LAFD Arson investigators and LAPD are responding with the preliminary reports on scene of the victim being a 15yo M passenger and one additional person in the vehicle safely exited prior to LAFD arrival. There are no further details for release while the incident is under investigation.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; AR1 BC13 E21 E233 E266 E33 E66 RA266 RA66 T33 T66; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart
